Package vocab

Class Vocabs

java.lang.Object
vocab.Vocabs
public class Vocabs extends Object
Defined double linked list holding the Vocab objects.

      public Vocabs()

  • Method Details

    • addVocab

      public void addVocab(ArrayList<String> vocab)
      Add the element at the end of the linked list. Unless the topic already exists. In which case simply modify the vocab with said topic.
      Parameters:
      vocab - , the formatted array containing topic and words. Basically the content of the Vocab object
      See Also:
      • Vocab()

    • modifyTopic_add

      public void modifyTopic_add(String seekedTopic, ArrayList<String> words)
      Loop through the linked list until finding the desired vocab upon which some words will be appended.
      Parameters:
      seekedTopic - , words

    • removeWordFrom

      public boolean removeWordFrom(String topic, String toRemove)
      Ensure that the word is in the topic list. If not, abandon the operation. Also, make sure to update the word array list.
      Parameters:
      topic -
      toRemove -
      Returns:
      true if remove worked, it didn't work because element is not in words

    • addVocabBefore

      public void addVocabBefore(ArrayList<String> vocab, String afterTopic)
      1) Loop until you find the node before the desired topic. Change the "prev" of that node as the given topic.
      2) Change the "previous" of the node next to the newly inserted node as that given topic.
      3) Ensure the configuration of the previous and next of the topic.
      Parameters:
      vocab - , formatted vocab (topic + words array) to be added
      afterTopic - , the topic that, once updated, will be the "next" of the given vocab.

    • addVocabAfter

      public void addVocabAfter(ArrayList<String> vocab, String prevTopic)
      1) Loop until you find the node containing the desired topic. Change the "next" of that node as the given topic.
      2) Change the "previous" of the node next to the newly inserted node as that given topic.
      3) Ensure the configuration of the previous and next of the topic.
      Parameters:
      vocab - , formatted vocab (topic + words array) to be added
      afterTopic - , the topic that, once updated, will be the "previous".

    • getWordsAsList

      public ArrayList<String> getWordsAsList(String topic)
      Get the words based on given topic as an array list.
      Parameters:
      topic - , topic you want to find the words for

    • getAllWordsAsList

      public ArrayList<String> getAllWordsAsList()
      Get the words based on given topic as an array list.
      Parameters:
      topic - , topic you want to find the words for

    • addWordTo

      public boolean addWordTo(String soughtTopic, String word)
      Loop through the vocab and check which has the sought topic. Check if the topic is already in the word list in which case abandon function.
      Parameters:
      soughtTopic -
      word -

    • getTopics

      public ArrayList<String> getTopics()
      Get a deep copy of the object list of topics within this vocabs list
      Returns:
      copy of the Vocabs list
